name: the Sisters
description:
// Made to order //

You choose the colors.

Our mountain range was inspired by a trip to Bend, OR and the Three Sisters Wilderness

We cut every piece by hand and design its color combination according to the materials we find locally. Each is machine sewn for durability. The Sisters cushion measures approx 18.5" x 12" x 4" and is stuffed with polyfil.

We are lucky to have a Pendleton Woolen Mill nearby and incorporate their quality textiles into our work whenever possible. We also use knitted wool sweaters and wool blankets after they have been felted. All were washed, usually twice, before being transformed into our original designs. While most materials are now color safe, we do NOT recommend machine wash due to the wool content. Spot cleaning or gentle hand wash in cold is recommended. 

Visit our ETSY STORE for more availability --
threebadseeds.etsy.com

categories.name: w i l d e r n e s s

name: the Fox
description:
// Made to order //

You choose the colors.

A quiet orange fox.

Our plush pillows are made of soft felted wool -- from knitted wool sweaters, vintage wool blankets or remnants from Pendleton Woolen Mills.

We cut every piece by hand and design its color combination according to the materials we find locally. Each is machine sewn for durability but also features hand embroidered accents.

Our fox measures approx. 15" x 11" x 4" and is stuffed with polyfil.
